title: Making Sri Lanka the ‘Wonder of Asia’ by 2016 : Budget 2012 ‘Development–oriented’
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa in his capacity as Finance and Planning Minister will present Budget 2012 in Parliament tomorrow. The budget would be development-oriented with the aim of making Sri Lanka the “Wonder of Asia” by 2016, according to Government sources. This will be the 65th Budget to be presented since Independece. Budget 2012 will be…
